DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from VMWare ESX, to be run in conjunction with Messages, Secure, vmkernel and vmkwarning connectors

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ useradd\[\d+\]: new user: name=\S+, (?:uid|UID)=\d+, (?:gid|GID)=\d+, home=[-/\w.]+, shell=[-/\w.]+
^\d+ [-\w.]+ usermod\[\d+\]: change user `\S+' GID from `\d+' to `\d+'

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) ([-/()\w.]+)[]\d[]*: pam_per_user: create_subrequest_handle\(\): doing map lookup for user "(.+)".*
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ [-/()\w.\[\]]+: pam_per_user: create_subrequest_handle\(\): doing map lookup for user ".+"

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) ([-/()\w.]+)[]\d[]*: pam_unix\(([-\w]+:\w+)\): authentication failure; logname=(\S*) uid=(\d+) euid=(\d+) tty=(\S*) ruser=(\S*) rhost=(\S*) *(.*?) *$
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ [-/()\w.\[\]]+: pam_unix\([-\w]+:\w+\): authentication failure; logname=\S* uid=\d+ euid=\d+ tty=\S* ruser=\S* rhost=\S*
^\d+ [-\w.]+ [-/()\w.\[\]]+: pam_unix\([-\w]+:\w+\): session opened for user .+ by \S*\(uid=\d+\)
^\d+ [-\w.]+ login: FAILED LOGIN \d+ FROM .+ FOR root, Authentication failure

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) ([-/()\w.]+)[]\d[]*: PAM (\d+) more authentication failures?; logname=(\S*) uid=(\d+) euid=(\d+) tty=(\S*) ruser=(\S*) rhost=(\S*) *(.*?) *$
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ sshd\[\d+\]: PAM \d+ more authentication failures?; logname=\S* uid=\d+ euid=\d+ tty=\S* ruser=\S* rhost=\S*
^\d+ [-\w.]+ sshd\[\d+\]+: Accepted password for .+ from [-\w.]+ port \d+ \w+

FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) ([-\w.]+) ([-/()\w.]+)[]\d[]*: Did not receive identification string from ([-\w.]+).*
FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ sshd\[\d+\]+: Did not receive identification string from [-\w.]+

FastField.defaultValue: Did not receive identification string from "$4"

FastPattern.pattern: ^\d+ [-\w.]+ sshd\[\d+\]+: PAM service\([-\w]+\) ignoring max retries; \d+ > \d+
^\d+ [-\w.]+ vmware-authd\[\d+\]: (?:hostd connection to [-\w.]+|Local connection for [-\w.]+ established)\. *$
